DESCRIPTION: If you are in a #yStance, trigger its Technique bonus.
Extra effect when played in the listed #yStance, or if you entered that #yStance this turn.
After playing a Finisher, if you are in a #yStance, exit it and trigger its Finisher bonus.
The next time you take #yAttack damage, deal damage back.
#yStance. NL #yTechnique Bonus: Gain #b5 #yCounter. NL #yFinisher Bonus: Gain #b12 #yBlock.
#yStance.  NL #yTechnique Bonus: #yFatigue #y5. NL #yFinisher Bonus: Lose all #yFatigue and gain that much HP, preserving #yStrength.
#yStance.  NL #yTechnique Bonus: Draw a card. NL #yFinisher Bonus: Next turn, draw #b1 card and gain [E] . End your turn.
#yStance. Counts as both #yDefensive and #yBerserker #yStances. NL Finishers do not exit the Stance. NL You can't change to any other #yStance.
Lose HP and gain #b1 Strength for every #b10 HP lost. Regenerate #yFatigued health at the end of combat.
